parts.text: {"word":"distraire","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(他動詞) 気を散らす、注意をそらす、楽しませる、慰める","english_definition":"(transitive verb) to distract, to divert attention, to entertain, to amuse, to console","examples":[{"sentence":"Le bruit l'a distrait de son travail.","translation":"その騒音は彼の仕事の邪魔をした。","type":"example"},{"sentence":"Essayons de le distraire de ses soucis.","translation":"彼の心配事を忘れさせてあげよう。","type":"example"},{"sentence":"Ce film m'a bien distrait.","translation":"この映画はとても楽しめた。","type":"example"}],"collocations":["distraire l'attention de quelqu'un (誰かの注意をそらす)","se distraire (気晴らしをする、楽しむ)"],"synonyms":["divertir","amuser","préoccuper","détourner"],"antonyms":["concentrer","focaliser"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(再帰動詞 se distraire) 気晴らしをする、楽しむ","english_definition":"(reflexive verb se distraire) to have fun, to enjoy oneself, to take one's mind off things","examples":[{"sentence":"Il faut se distraire de temps en temps.","translation":"時々は気晴らしをしなければならない。","type":"example"},{"sentence":"Je me suis distrait en lisant un livre.","translation":"本を読んで気晴らしをした。","type":"example"}],"collocations":["se distraire avec (～で楽しむ)","se distraire à (～で楽しむ)"],"synonyms":["s'amuser","se divertir","se changer les idées"],"antonyms":["s'ennuyer"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の 'distrahere'（引き離す、引き裂く）に由来。","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/dis.tʁɛʁ/","syllables":"dis-traire"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"indicative":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"distrais","2nd_person_singular":"distrais","3rd_person_singular":"distrait","1st_person_plural":"distrayons","2nd_person_plural":"distrayez","3rd_person_plural":"distraient"},"imperfect":{"1st_person_singular":"distrayais","2nd_person_singular":"distrayais","3rd_person_singular":"distrayait","1st_person_plural":"distrayions","2nd_person_plural":"distrayiez","3rd_person_plural":"distrayaient"},"past_historic":{"1st_person_singular":"distrayis","2nd_person_singular":"distrayis","3rd_person_singular":"distrayit","1st_person_plural":"distrayîmes","2nd_person_plural":"distrayîtes","3rd_person_plural":"distrayirent"},"future":{"1st_person_singular":"distrairai","2nd_person_singular":"distrairas","3rd_person_singular":"distraira","1st_person_plural":"distrairons","2nd_person_plural":"distrairez","3rd_person_plural":"distrairont"}},"subjunctive":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"distraie","2nd_person_singular":"distraies","3rd_person_singular":"distraie","1st_person_plural":"distrayions","2nd_person_plural":"distrayiez","3rd_person_plural":"distraient"},"imperfect":{"1st_person_singular":"distrayisse","2nd_person_singular":"distrayisses","3rd_person_singular":"distrayît","1st_person_plural":"distrayissions","2nd_person_plural":"distrayissiez","3rd_person_plural":"distrayissent"}},"conditional":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"distrairais","2nd_person_singular":"distrairais","3rd_person_singular":"distrairait","1st_person_plural":"distrairions","2nd_person_plural":"distrairiez","3rd_person_plural":"distrairaient"}},"imperative":{"present":{"2nd_person_singular":"distrais","1st_person_plural":"distrayons","2nd_person_plural":"distrayez"}},"participle":{"present":"distrayant","past":"distrait"},"gerund":"distrayant"}},"notes":"フランス語の動詞。"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Distraire' は、注意をそらすこと、楽しませること、気晴らしをすることなど、複数の意味を持つ動詞です。再帰動詞 'se distraire' は、自分自身を楽しませる、気晴らしをするという意味になります。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Je suis distrait. (注意散漫だ、ぼんやりしている)","correct":"Je me suis distrait. (気晴らしをした)","note":"'distrait' は形容詞で「注意散漫な」という意味。気晴らしをした、という場合は 'se distraire' を使う。"}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["distraction (名詞: 気晴らし、娯楽、注意散漫)","distrait (形容詞: 注意散漫な、ぼんやりした)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"N/A","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"'Distraire' は、フランス語で「気を散らす」「楽しませる」という意味の動詞です。日常会話や文章でよく使われます。'Se distraire' という再帰動詞の形では、「気晴らしをする」「楽しむ」という意味になります。例えば、勉強中に携帯電話が気を散らす場合や、映画を見て楽しむ場合などに使えます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"La musique douce le distrayait de ses soucis.","translation":"優しい音楽は彼の心配事を忘れさせた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"気を散らす、楽しませる"},{"sentence":"Pour se distraire, elle lit des romans policiers.","translation":"気晴らしに、彼女は推理小説を読む。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"気晴らしをする"},{"sentence":"Le clown a distrait les enfants avec ses tours.","translation":"ピエロは芸で子供たちを楽しませた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"楽しませる"}]}
